Package Models

Class Phase

  • java.lang.Object
    • Models.Phase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    IssueOrderPhase, OrderExecutionPhase, StartUpPhase
    public abstract class Phase
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This Interface enforces the method requirement for Each Game Phase.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Constructor for initializing the current game engine and game state.

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      protected abstract void createPlayers​(Command p_command, Player p_player)
      Basic validation of gameplayer command for checking required arguments and redirecting control to the model for adding or removing players.
      protected abstract void doAdvance​(java.lang.String p_command, Player p_player)
      Handles the advance order in the gameplay.
      protected abstract void doAssignCountries​(Command p_command, Player p_player, boolean p_isTournamentMode, GameState p_gameState)
      Performing preliminary validation on the assigncountries function to ensure all necessary arguments are present, and then transferring control to the model responsible for allocating countries to players.
      protected abstract void doCardHandle​(java.lang.String p_enteredCommand, Player p_player)
      Handles the card commands.

      Handles the deployment order in the gameplay.

      Initial validation of the 'editcontinent' command to verify the presence of essential arguments, followed by directing control to the model for processing.

      Performing initial validation of the 'editcountry' command to confirm the presence of mandatory arguments, followed by transferring control to the model for execution.

      Method to validate map.
